subject: Throttle deadzone
description_text:
I'm having an issue. I have a massive deadzone on the initial press of the
pedal. Almost half the distance is deadzone. Deadzone is set to 0.

conversations.body_text: Hi Christian Mallon,  Please provide your order number along with a photo of the pedal installation and a screenshot of the dead zone settings in SIMSONN Manager. If your device is a PlusX, ProX, or ProX Ultra, please update the software to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 and update the pedal firmware via the “Check for Updates” option in the settings menu. Once updated, you can use the Offset function to reset the offset to zero, which will automatically adjust the dead zone to the minimum edge based on the current pedal pressure.

It fixed itself somehow. It's good now. Thank you.
